short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do alot about Github and PT process in EA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Main features: 

1. Automatically add 3 last letters of the ID to the name after creating a story.

2. Look for all commit in the pull request, for each commit have [#story_id], this plugin will look for story name from Pivotal Tracker and add story link to pull request's description.

You must login to Pivotal Tracker to make this extension work.
